column4: Traffic;(Phnom Penh):------ The Prek Phnov Bridge (Ly Yong Phat Bridge) to National Highway 6 will be closed for 5 days from today to 1 January 2019 for the launching celebrations of the “Win-Win” monument.------The monument celebrates the 20th anniversary of the end of the war in Cambodia.------The Capital Hall also said that for people who are traveling along the highway
column5: to use an alternative route away from Prek Kdam bridge.
